[
  {
    "type": "insecure_mode",
    "severity": "high",
    "algorithm": "AES-ECB",
    "description": "ECB mode encrypts identical plaintext blocks to identical ciphertext, leaking patterns. Use CBC, CTR, or GCM modes.",
    "evidence": "AES-ECB mode detected in function _main at address 0x100000500",
    "recommendation": "Use AES-CBC with random IV or AES-GCM for authenticated encryption"
  },
  {
    "type": "deprecated_algorithm",
    "severity": "critical", 
    "algorithm": "RC4",
    "description": "RC4 stream cipher is deprecated due to multiple cryptographic weaknesses and biases in the keystream.",
    "evidence": "RC4 stream cipher initialization pattern found at offset 0x589",
    "recommendation": "Replace RC4 with modern stream ciphers like ChaCha20 or use AES-CTR mode"
  }
]
